channel.title: Cryptography on Huzaif
channel.description: Recent content in Cryptography on Huzaif

item.description: Ever questioned how do you see a website? visiting my website through a Browser? The browser goes to the DNS server and finds the real address of the server that the website lives on (IP address). Browser sends an HTTP request to the server, asking it to send a copy of the website you asked for. This message and all other data sent between the client and the server, is sent across your internet connection using TCP/IP.
